short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Vim-inspired radio player. Listen to the best South African Radio Stations effortlessly.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Yiva is a browser-based radio player designed to make listening to the radio a lot more effortless and enjoyable. You can choose from an eclectic mix of the most popular radio stations in South Africa and listen right in your browser. Additionally, you can control this extension with easy to use key-bindings from *any tab*.

## Key bindings
Control Yiva from whichever tab your internet escapades may lead you with the following commands:

Alt + O (Open Yiva)
Alt + K (Mute/Unmute)
Alt + L (Play next station)
Alt + J (Play prev. station)

Happy Listening!
